description.value: Primary Energy: Water 6 (freezing blast, high damage) Supporting Energy: Space 3 ( 60ft cone) Range: 60ft cone Duration: Instantaneous Total Cost: 9 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Water Potential + Water Mastery + Space Potential + Space Mastery (4d8) Effect: A blast of cold air erupts from your hands. All creatures in a 60-foot cone take [[/damage 40 type=cold]] damage. Each target takes the full listed damage and makes their own save. Applies Effects: slowed Saving Throw: Reflex (to reduce damage) Damage Type: Cold (energy) DR Interaction: Half DR ([[/damage 40 type=cold]] damage vs DR 4 becomes 40 - 2 = [[/damage 38]] damage) Success Scaling (Net successes = Your successes - Their successes): 0 = no damage, 1 = half damage (20), 2 = full damage (40), 3 = +[[/damage 8]] damage (48 total), 4 = +[[/damage 16]] damage (56 total) Slowed Condition (at Net 4): Target's movement speed is halved and they have Misfortune on Reflex saves until the end of their next turn.
